Html: How do move or control where the updates are stored on 2012 server current updates for WSUS stored on E drive but I think the default for WSUS Package Publisher is the C Drive

Hi, WPP doesn't store any updates. It import packages into Wsus, then Wsus store it in :

\\ WsusServerName \UpdateServicesPackages\ GUID
and
\\ WsusServerName \WsusContent\ ID

In WPP, when you select an update, in the 'Informations' Tab, you can click on blue link to open the folder where the update is stored.
